title: Quick Beets With Chile And Lemon
summary: Quick Beets With Chile And Lemon might be just the side dish you are searching for. This caveman, gluten free, primal, and whole 30 recipe serves 2 and costs $1.88 per serving. One portion of this dish contains around 5g of protein, 1g of fat, and a total of 140 calories. 5 people were glad they tried this recipe. Head to the store and pick up chile powder, peel the beets and thinly using a knife, beets, and a few other things to make it today. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 8 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 90%. This score is spectacular. Similar recipes are Quick Pickled Beets, Rose Murray's Quick Pickled Beets, and Quick Pickled Beets and Yellow Wax Beans with Fetan and Chives.
